topic_zh: 黄花环绕的列车与铁轨
topic_reasoning_zh: 所有图片均展示列车行驶在黄花环绕的铁轨上，构成美丽景致。
topic_reasoning_en: All images depict trains moving on rails surrounded by yellow flowers, creating beautiful scenes.
